Question 31
                          
 
 
Which of the following is responsible for eddy viscosity (or turbulent viscosity) in a turbulent boundary 
layer on a flat plate ?
Fluid Mechanics (Air Turbulent flow)

GATE 2021 
 [Afternoon Session]
Mechanical Engineering
PAGE
30

(A) Reynolds stresses   
 
(B) Nikuradse stresses  
 
(C) Prandtl stresses  
 
 
(D) Boussinesq equation stresses  
Ans. 
A 
Sol.
 
Reynold stresses is responsible for eddy viscosity (turbulent viscosity) in a turbulent layer on a flat plate. 
 
Hence, the correct option is (A).
